configuration.analyzeTable: Specific table names to operate on (string)
configuration.analyzeSchema: Schema to be analyzed, vacuumed, or encoded (string)
configuration.comprows: Rows to use in the analyze compression request (int | default -1 meaning unspecified)
configuration.dbPassword: Your base64 encoded encrypted password here (string - generated with encrypt_password.py)
configuration.dbUser: The database User to connect to (string)
configuration.dropOldData: When column encoding is invoked, should the old database table be kept as XXX_$old? (boolean - true | false | default false)
configuration.ignoreErrors: Should a given utility keep running if it encouters errors, and fail the Lambda function? (boolean - true | false | default false)
configuration.queryGroup: Query group name to set for routing to a specific WLM queue (string)
configuration.querySlotCount: Number of query slots to use - set to queue(max) for optimal performance (int - default 1)
configuration.targetSchema: When column encoding is invoked, should it build new tables into a different schema? (string)
configuration.force: Do you want to force the utility to run for each provided table or schema, even if changes are not required? (boolean - true | false | default false)
configuration.debug: Should the utilities run in debug mode? (boolean - true | false | default false)
configuration.do-execute: Should changes be made automatically, or just for reporting purposes (boolean - true |  false | default true)
configuration.analyze_col_width: Analyze columns wider than this value (int)
configuration.threads: How many threads should the column encoding utility use (can run in parallel - default 1 for Lambda)
configuration.ssl-option: Should you connect to the cluster with SSL? (boolean true | false | default true)
configuration.doVacuum: Should the Analyze Vacuum utility run Vacuum? (boolean true | false | default true)
configuration.doAnalyze: Should the Analyze Vacuum utility run Analyze? (boolean true | false | default true)
configuration.tableBlacklist: comma separated list of tables to suppress running the analyze vacuum utility against
configuration.aggregationInterval: Interval on which to summarise database statistics (redshift interval literal: http://docs.aws.amazon.com/redshift/latest/dg/r_interval_literals.html | default '1 hour'
configuration.clusterName: The cluster name that is the first part of the DNS name
